{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the source of prostaglandins. According to the documents, prostaglandins are synthesized from polyunsaturated fatty acids, such as arachidonic acid. This information can be found in the document 'Prostaglandin chemistry' which states that most cell types possess the enzyme systems necessary for the conversion of precursor fatty acids into these compounds.", "answer_choice": C}
